Detailed Description

SimTkMainMenuProvider is the provider to retrieve the main menu of the sim toolkit. An instance of this class is part of the Apoxi Data Control. A pointer to this provider can be retrieved from the main provider via the id:

c_simtk_mainmenu_provider_id

Following column ids are defined: c_options_id :NumberType: c_title_id :WStringType: c_title_icon_id :NumberType: c_title_icon_isselfexp_id :NumberType: c_item_string_id :WStringType: c_item_id :NumberType: c_next_action_id :NumberType: c_icon_id :NumberType:

NOTE: Please do not instantiate this class.
